text: Michael Glenn "Mike" Mullen, AO, MSC (born October 4, 1946) is a former Chairman of the Joint Chiefs Of Staff. He also served in the United States Navy. He fought in the Vietnam War and the Persian Gulf War. ==Personal life== Mullen is married to Deborah. They have two sons, John “JMuls” Mullen and Michael Edward Mullen. Both of them are Navy officers. == References == Category:1946 births Category:Military people from California Category:Living people Category:Chairmen of the Joint Chiefs of Staff
title: Michael Mullen
